nodes.text: Behind the Threat: The Sith, Part 1: Portrayal
Behind the Threat: The Sith is a web enhancement written by Matthew Grau and released by Wizards of the Coast on June 18, 2008. It discussed the Sith, and their role in the Galaxy.
In the article, Jacen Solo is mistakenly referred to as "Jacen Skywalker".
